results.title: Carrie
results.brief_description: A reimagining of the classic horror tale about Carrie White, a shy girl outcast by her peers and sheltered by her deeply religious mother, who unleashes telekinetic terror on her small town after being pushed too far at her senior prom.

constellations_other.name: Blood, shot
constellations_other.description: The fake blood used by costume designer Edie Kurzer in Judy & Punch is connected to a long, bloody lineage in cinema.

results.description: A reimagining of the classic horror tale about Carrie White, a shy girl outcast by her peers and sheltered by her deeply religious mother, who unleashes telekinetic terror on her small town after being pushed too far at her senior prom.

results.title: Carriberrie
results.brief_description: Narrated by award-winning actor and dancer David Gulpilil, Carriberrie guides audiences across a stunning array of iconic Australian locations and performances, from the traditional to contemporary.

constellations_other.name: Place, portraiture, performance
constellations_other.description: The nature of the collaboration between David Gulpilil and Rolf De Heer on Ten Canoes connects the film to their other collaborations, and a number of other works as well.

results.description: Narrated by award-winning actor and dancer David Gulpilil, Carriberrie guides audiences across a stunning array of iconic Australian locations and performances, from the traditional to contemporary. From ceremonial creation dances in the heart of the Outback, to honey gathering songs in the rain-forest, bush-punk band The Lonely Boys performing in Alice Springs and a finale featuring Ban-garra Dance Theatre by Sydney Harbour, Carriberrie brings together art, technology and Indigenous performance in inspired new ways.
description_for_label: Narrated by award-winning actor and dancer David Gulpilil, Carriberrie guides audiences across a stunning array of iconic Australian locations and performances, from the traditional to contemporary. From ceremonial creation dances in the heart of the Outback, to honey gathering songs in the rain-forest, bush-punk band The Lonely Boys performing in Alice Springs and a finale featuring Ban-garra Dance Theatre by Sydney Harbour, Carriberrie brings together art, technology and Indigenous performance in inspired new ways.

results.title: Caravaggio
results.brief_description: As influential Italian artist Caravaggio dies in exile in 1610, he recalls his short life, from his childhood to his initial artistic failures to his later triumphs as he catches the eye of a sympathetic cardinal to his destructive relationship with a dashing gambler.

constellations_other.name: Sandy, Swinton, Shakespeare and Derek
constellations_other.description: Tracing costume designer Sandy Powell's ongoing connections with Tilda Swinton, William Shakespeare and Derek Jarman.

results.description: As influential Italian artist Caravaggio dies in exile in 1610, he recalls his short life, from his childhood to his initial artistic failures to his later triumphs as he catches the eye of a sympathetic cardinal to his destructive relationship with a dashing gambler.

results.title: Captain Planet and the Planeteers
results.brief_description:
Captain Planet and the Planeteers is an American animated environmentalist television program created by Ted Turner, Robert Larkin III, and Barbara Pyle, produced by Pyle, Nicholas Boxer, Andy Heyward and Robby London, and developed by Pyle, Boxer, Heyward, London, Thom Beers, Bob Forward, Phil Harnage and Cassandra Schafhausen. The series was produced by Turner Program Services and DIC Entertainment and it was broadcast on TBS from September 15, 1990 to December 5, 1992. A sequel series, The New Adventures of Captain Planet, was produced by Hanna-Barbera and Turner Program Services, and was broadcast from September 11, 1993 to May 11, 1996. Both series continue today in syndication. The program is a form of edutainment and advocates environmentalism.

In February 2009, Mother Nature Network began airing episodes and unreleased footage of Captain Planet and the Planeteers on its website. In September 2010, the Planeteer Movement was launched with the assistance of Pyle as a means for fans of the show to connect and continue to integrate the show’s messages into their lives as real-life Planeteers.

results.title: Captain Marvel
results.brief_description: Brie Larson stars as Captain Marvel, the first female superhero to take centre stage in the Marvel Cinematic Universe. Set in the 1990s, Captain Marvel explores a previously unseen period in the MCU and made over $1 billion USD at the box office.

constellations_other.name: Superhero special effects
constellations_other.description: VFX talent isn't limited to just one studio that makes superhero blockbusters.

results.description: The story follows Carol Danvers as she becomes one of the universe’s most powerful heroes when Earth is caught in the middle of a galactic war between two alien races. Set in the 1990s, Captain Marvel is an all-new adventure from a previously unseen period in the history of the Marvel Cinematic Universe.
description_for_label: The story follows Carol Danvers as she becomes one of the universe’s most powerful heroes when Earth is caught in the middle of a galactic war between two alien races. Set in the 1990s, Captain Marvel is an all-new adventure from a previously unseen period in the history of the Marvel Cinematic Universe.

results.title: Cape Fear
results.creator_credit: John D. MacDonald, Barbara De Fina, Wesley Strick, Rita Ryack, Martin Scorsese, Robert De Niro, Henry Bumstead, Tribeca Productions, Cappa Productions, Amblin Entertainment and Universal Pictures
results.brief_description: Sam Bowden is a small-town corporate attorney. Max Cady is a tattooed, cigar-smoking, bible-quoting, psychopath. Their worlds collide in this remake of the original by Martin Scorsese.

constellations_other.name: Movies in movies in a movie museum
constellations_other.description: The 400 Porto-Arc 16mm projector used the first electric light ever invented, which was perfectly suited for movie projectors. This Constellation explores the movies where characters go to the movies, by two movie-obsessed directors.

results.creator_credit_for_label: John D. MacDonald, Barbara De Fina, Wesley Strick, Rita Ryack, Martin Scorsese, Robert De Niro, Henry Bumstead, Tribeca Productions, Cappa Productions, Amblin Entertainment and Universal Pictures
results.description: Sam Bowden is a small-town corporate attorney. Max Cady is a tattooed, cigar-smoking, bible-quoting, psychotic rapist. What do they have in common? Fourteen years ago, Sam was a public defender assigned to Max Cady’s rape trial, and he made a serious error: he hid a document from his illiterate client that could have gotten him acquitted. Now, the cagey, bibliophile Cady has been released, and he intends to teach Sam Bowden and his family a thing or two about loss.
description_for_label: Sam Bowden is a small-town corporate attorney. Max Cady is a tattooed, cigar-smoking, bible-quoting, psychotic rapist. What do they have in common? Now, the cagey, bibliophile Cady has been released, and he intends to teach Sam Bowden and his family a thing or two about loss.

results.title: Candyman
results.brief_description: Spiritual sequel to the slasher classic from producer Jordan Peele.

constellations_other.name: Sweet Country
constellations_other.description: Warwick Thornton’s feature film Sweet Country is based on the story of Wilaberta Jack, which was told to sound recordist David Tranter by his grandfather and translated into storyboards.

results.description: Spiritual sequel to the slasher classic from producer Jordan Peele.
description_for_label: Spiritual sequel to the slasher classic from producer Jordan Peele.

results.title: Canada on Strike
results.brief_description: The head of the World Canadian Bureau leads the country into a long and painful strike and the responsibility of brokering a settlement rests with the boys.
results.description: The head of the World Canadian Bureau leads the country into a long and painful strike and the responsibility of brokering a settlement rests with the boys.
description_for_label: The head of the World Canadian Bureau leads the country into a long and painful strike and the responsibility of brokering a settlement rests with the boys.

results.title: Cameraperson
results.creator_credit: Marilyn Ness, Doris Baizley, Kirsten Johnson, Lisa Freedman, Big Mouth Productions and Fork Films
results.brief_description: As a visually radical memoir, CAMERAPERSON draws on the remarkable footage that filmmaker Kirsten Johnson has shot and reframes it in ways that illuminate moments and situations that have personally affected her. What emerges is an elegant meditation on the relationship between truth and the camera frame, as Johnson transforms scenes that have been presented on Festival screens as one kind of truth into another kind of story—one about personal journey, craft, and direct human connection.

constellations_other.name: My Hometown: Archives woven into new narrative
constellations_other.description: Offering viewers a snapshot of life on the road for an Australian touring band in the 1960s, 'My Hometown', directed by Sari Braithwaite was developed reimagining archival 8mm footage shot by drummer Leon Isackson.

results.creator_credit_for_label: Marilyn Ness, Doris Baizley, Kirsten Johnson, Lisa Freedman, Big Mouth Productions and Fork Films
results.description: As a visually radical memoir, CAMERAPERSON draws on the remarkable footage that filmmaker Kirsten Johnson has shot and reframes it in ways that illuminate moments and situations that have personally affected her. What emerges is an elegant meditation on the relationship between truth and the camera frame, as Johnson transforms scenes that have been presented on Festival screens as one kind of truth into another kind of story—one about personal journey, craft, and direct human connection.

results.title: Cabiria
results.brief_description: Cabiria is a 1914 Italian epic silent film, directed by Giovanni Pastrone that laid the foundation for the Hollywood epics that followed. Featuring groundbreaking special effects used to show a volcanic eruption, the film is also famous for inventing the tracking shot.

constellations_other.name: Tracking cinema
constellations_other.description: A constellation looking at the evolution of the tracking / dolly shot.

results.description: Young Cabiria is kidnapped by pirates and sold as a slave in Carthage. Just as she’s to be sacrificed to Moloch, Cabiria is rescued by Fulvius Axilla, a good-hearted Roman spy, and his powerful slave, Maciste. The trio are broken up and Cabiria is entrusted to woman of noble birth. With Maciste punished for his heroism, Fulvius sent away to fight for Rome, and Cabiria’s fate unknown, is there any hope of our heroes reuniting?
description_for_label: Young Cabiria is kidnapped by pirates and sold as a slave in Carthage.
